meanings.definition: The state or quality of lacking color.
meanings.sent1: The colorlessness of the room made it feel dull and uninteresting.
meanings.sent2: The artist used colorlessness to create a minimalist painting.
meanings.sent3: The colorlessness of the rainbow unicorn costume was unintentional but hilarious.
meanings.sent4: In the black and white movie, the colorlessness of the scenes added to the nostalgic feel.
meanings.sent5: The colorlessness of the winter landscape was both serene and melancholic.

meanings.sent1: The colorlessness of the sky during the storm was eerie.
meanings.sent2: The black and white photograph captured the colorlessness of the old building.
meanings.sent3: The colorlessness of the painting made it look like a ghostly image.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit's colorlessness stood out in a sea of vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The colorlessness of the desert at night was both beautiful and haunting.
